description:
Hitagi, the main character of Hitagi Crab, is a weak-looking girl with an "incurable disease". She is in the same class as http://anidb.net/ch8962 [Koyomi], but he has almost never heard her speak.
When she was in the first year of high school, she encountered a mysterious crab, after which she became weightless. Ever since, she has avoided contact with everyone else, threatening everyone who discovers her secret. She called herself a tsundere and always speaks in an abusive style.
name: Senjougahara Hitagi
